benchmark_details.name: DeepTelecom
benchmark_details.overview: DeepTelecom is a 3D digital-twin channel dataset that leverages a LLM-assisted pipeline to construct detailed outdoor and indoor environments with segmentable and material-parameterizable surfaces at LoD3 precision. Utilizing Sionnaâ€™s ray-tracing engine, DeepTelecom accurately simulates comprehensive radio-wave propagation effects.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for wireless AI research and to enable the integration of large model intelligence with next-generation communication systems.

data.source: Generated from a LLM-assisted, multi-source scene modeling and ray-tracing simulation framework.
data.size: Thousands of transmitter-receiver pairs and millions of raw ray paths
data.annotation: Automatically verified and assigned using a Large Language Model (LLM)

methodology.calculation: CIR and CFR are computed from multi-hop propagation paths using detailed ray-traced data.
methodology.interpretation: Higher fidelity and accuracy in channel modeling improves performance in wireless communication applications.
methodology.validation: Comprehensive scene generality and scenario diversity tested across various environments.
